award_title: Computational design of Solvated-electron-based Materials for Applications in Redox Chemistry and Quantum Information
subject: Designing around diffuse electrons
body:
Hi Evangelos,

I've been thinking about how designing materials with diffuse electrons between layers requires some pretty specific computational approachesâ€”and how hard it must be for other groups to actually use those methods once you publish.

That's what we're building with Ouro: an API layer that lets researchers call your computational workflows directly instead of trying to recreate them from scratch.

Would you be open to a quick chat in January?

Happy holidays,

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
